Please open the traffic switch of the Lenovo desktop.
Cloud backup need landing Lenovo account, and consume some traffic. It is recommended that you back up under WLAN.
Lenovo desktop will not be able to use any network while the switch is off.
The backup will be covering the last cloud backup。

Cloud download ok, will you restore desktop now?
Cloud download ok, click to restore deskop now
Cloud restore need landing Lenovo account, and consume some traffic.It is recommended that you back up under WLAN.
Cloud restore will restore your backup, and it will restart desktop when restore completed.
Cloud restore is in progress, please wait.
